column5: Fer Me Wife  I writes ta say I loves ya b'ye! Cause I don't say it very much Everytime I tries ta cuddle ya Ya says GIT A WAY, DON'T TOUCH! I tried ta be more gentle Took me rubbers off outside When I tells ya where I was last nite Ya always tinks I lied Ya knows I loves me Fishin Ya knows I loves me boat! But you're da life preserver I needs to stay afloat! So I got ya sometin really nice How much, please don't ask But you'll find it a lot easier now When ya goes ta cut da grass! Just pull da cord,stand behind Steer her as you go Next Valentines I'll get ya sometin Dat helps ya shovel snow! So keep up da cookin and cleanin You're de only one I got To keep me duds all washed and clean And me coffee always hot! You knows dat I appreciates Your home made buns & Bread And I hope dat it continues on Till one of us is dead!
that was a good laugh.  thx
Tanks alot dare Matey! Now I don't haf ta buy da wifey an expensive store bought card for Valentines Day!
